creator: csharp@mac.com

text:
There's no P_USER_COLLECTION static field in 
org.apache.slide.webdav.util.AclConstants out of the current CVS Head.
creator: iasandcb@apache-korea.org

text:
The build resulted in the following error from the current CVS Head.

...

exist

ache\slide\lock\LockImpl.java:412: cannot resolve symbol

creator: iasandcb@apache-korea.org
csharp@mac.com
text: This was fixed soon after it was reported.
